manifesto.title: ARTIST'S MANIFESTO
manifesto.content: This is blood on canvas. Each piece born in chaos, destroyed in passion. We don't decorate walls - we document survival.

artCollections.title: Burned Archives

liveStreamSchedule.title: Wednesday Destruction
liveStreamSchedule.description: Weekly live painting ritual - creation or destruction decided by chat

faq.question: Why burn art?
faq.answer: If art doesn't resonate enough to be saved, it becomes fuel for the next creation.

faq.question: Do you ship internationally?
faq.answer: Yes, I ship worldwide. Shipping costs will vary depending on your location.

faq.question: Can I rescue a painting after destruction?
faq.answer: No. Once the burning starts, there's no going back.

faq.question: What happens if I buy a painting mid-stream?
faq.answer: The destruction halts immediately. I will finish the painting live, and we'll arrange for shipping.

faq.question: Why not just sell all your work normally?
faq.answer: The fire gives the art life, making it something that can die.

communityGuidelines.title: Our Code
rules: No unsolicited advice - only supportive presence
